# Autogenerated from MultiSource/Benchmarks/Olden/treeadd/Makefile

set(DIRS)
set(PARALLEL_DIRS)

set(LEVEL ../../../..)
set(PROG treeadd)
set(CPPFLAGS -DTORONTO)
set(LDFLAGS )
if(DEFINED SMALL_PROBLEM_SIZE)
  set(RUN_OPTIONS 20)
else()
  set(RUN_OPTIONS 22)
  if("${ARCH}" STREQUAL "XCore")
    set(XCORE_TARGET_NEEDS_MEMORY 128)
  endif()
endif()
llvm_multisource()

llvm_add_subdirectories(${DIRS} ${PARALLEL_DIRS})
